about_the_game:
A game where the power of stories shapes reality, driven by AI language model...

Adapted from Persian folklore: The brutal King Shahryar, enraged by suspected betrayal of his wife, takes a new bride each day only to execute her at dawn. You are Shahrzad, his next bride...

Can you end his reign of terror through your stories?

Inspired by Wittgenstein's notion: "The limits of my language mean the limits of my world."

Unleash your imagination! Tell captivating tales to intrigue the AI-powered King, cleverly guiding him to mention words like 'sword', 'knife', or 'shield' - watch as they materialize into real weapons!

Brought to life by cutting-edge AI language models, each story is a unique creation - completely unscripted! But beware... strange words might provoke the King's wrath...

Collect weapons forged from your stories!

Generated in real-time based on your narratives! From shawarma kitchen knives to witch's spears... every weapon is one of a kind!

Battle the King in a world born from your tales!

Each battle is an unprecedented theatrical performance - weapon effects and even character dialogues spring from the stories you've crafted!

Features:

AI-Native Game:

  • Powered by generative AI (especially large language models) as core gameplay mechanics. In other words, this innovative experience would be impossible without AI. Award-winning gameplay ensures every story is unique!

Pixel Art Aesthetics:

  • Features distinctive pixel art and hand-drawn CGs! AI is used solely for the innovative storytelling gameplay - all artwork is created by human artists.

Challenge Traditional Norms:

  • Break free from ancient patriarchal constraints with Shahrzad!

Academic Foundation:

  • More than just a game - it's an academic and artistic project. We've published two papers on the game's systems, hoping to inspire more novel games!
